item.title: Moving to Hugo
item.description: In the last few days, I worked to move this website to Hugo. I have been using WordPress for years (this domain turned 15 earlier this month) in a dozen projects however it was time to change. Decided to follow a minimalist setup with Hugo. About the stack I decided to use Hugo here because I wanted something simple. KISS. I like Gatsby and Next.js however I didn’t want to choose a JavaScript solution.
